title: How to Add a Temporary Profile Picture on Facebook

steps.title: Open the Facebook app.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app. It's a white "f" on a blue background. If you aren't signed into Facebook, enter your email address (or phone number) and password and tap Log In .

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . It's in the bottom right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap your name.
steps.content: Tap your name. It should be at the top of the screen. If you're using Facebook as a page, tap the page's name here.

steps.title: Tap Edit on your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap Edit on your profile picture. You'll see this option at the bottom of the profile image thumbnail that's at the top of your Facebook page.

steps.title: Tap Select Profile Picture.
steps.content: Tap Select Profile Picture . You have a few different albums to choose from: Camera Roll - Your phone's saved photos. Photos of You - All Facebook photos in which you are tagged. Suggested - Photos that Facebook picks from your Facebook albums. Albums - Browse through all Facebook albums.

steps.title: Tap a photo to use.
steps.content: Tap a photo to use.

steps.title: Tap Make Temporary.
steps.content: Tap Make Temporary .

steps.title: Tap a duration.
steps.content: Tap a duration. You have four options for the amount of time your temporary profile picture will remain in place: 1 Hour 1 Day 1 Week Custom (you'll need to choose a revert date)

steps.title: Tap Use.
steps.content: Tap Use . It's in the top right corner of the screen. Your temporary profile picture will remain in place until it expires or you replace it. When your photo expires, the last profile photo you used will reappear.

steps.title: Open the Facebook website.
steps.content: Open the Facebook website . Facebook will open to your News Feed page. If you aren't logged in, type in your email address and password in the top right corner of the page and click Log In .

steps.title: Click your name tab.
steps.content: Click your name tab. It's in the top right section of the Facebook page. The name tab will also have a small image of your current profile picture.

steps.title: Hover over your profile picture and click Update Profile Picture.
steps.content: Hover over your profile picture and click Update Profile Picture . The profile picture is in the top left corner of your Facebook page.

steps.title: Select a photo to use.
steps.content: Select a photo to use. You can scroll down through all of your Facebook photos, or you can click Take Photo or Upload Photo to add a photo to Facebook.

steps.title: Click Make Temporary.
steps.content: Click Make Temporary .

steps.title: Click the 1 Day box.
steps.content: Click the 1 Day box. It's to the right of the "Switch back to previous profile picture in" text above the Make Temporary option. You can select one of the following time limits: 1 Hour 1 Day 1 Week Never Custom (you'll need to choose a date)

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . Your temporary Facebook profile picture is now in place.
